metadata.synopsis: A Bhaal Reaper in the Temple of Bhaal.

0.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Eglantine
0.text: The blood on his profane hands... It could have been yours too. You could have been Chosen.
0.context: NodeContext: Satisfied - things are finally going right

1.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Eglantine
1.text: All of Toril shall scream at your command... and we shall dance atop its dying whimpers.

2.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Eglantine
2.text: Bhaal will choose another, soon enough - one who will hunt down previous failures like your companion. I would start running.
2.context: NodeContext: Satisfied - things are finally going right

3.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Eglantine
3.text: All of Toril could have screamed at your command... A shame.

4.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Eglantine
4.text: I can hear the screams already, Chosen. Murder reigns at last.
4.context: NodeContext: Satisfied - things are finally going right

5.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Eglantine
5.text: If you care for anyone up above - tell them to start running. I like a chase.
5.context: NodeContext: Satisfied - things are finally going right

6.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Eglantine
6.text: Lady Orin has long awaited your presence here... I have long awaited the sound of your screams.
